title: Simple Tomato Pasta
description: A quick and easy pasta dish with tomato sauce.
ingredients: pasta, tomato sauce, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper
steps:
1. Boil pasta in salted water.
2. Heat olive oil and garlic.
3. Add tomato sauce and simmer.
4. Mix pasta with sauce and serve.

title: Garlic Butter Shrimp
description: Pan-fried shrimp with garlic butter sauce.
ingredients: shrimp, butter, garlic, lemon, salt, pepper
steps:
1. Melt butter in pan.
2. Add garlic and cook until fragrant.
3. Add shrimp and cook until pink.
4. Squeeze lemon on top and serve.
